artist: Author: Jalaluddin Mohammad Rumi; Translator: Zahra Partovi; Joan Busing; Sandy Gellis; Elizabeth Harrington; Bernard Kirschenbaum; Ted Kurahara; James Nares; Dorothea Rockburne; Betye Saar; Annette Senneby; Michelle Stuart; Peter Thomson; Judith Turner; Marjorie VanDyke; Joan Vennum; Susan Weil; Publisher: Vincent FitzGerald & Company, New York
image_copyright: © 1996 Vincent FitzGerald & Company, New York, publisher
medium: Lithography, etching, photogravure, screenprinting, plotter drawing, collage, and letterpress, bound volume
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil by the translator Zahra Partovi and each of the 15 artists
title: Divan e Shams
